--- xochitla2006 <xochitla2006@...> wrote:

> Nightstrike/DarkFate:
> 
> "Ok"replied Nightstrike ad then they open a comlink to
> Deepstrike"We're 
> departing to your coordinates and ready for action"
> 
> The bots ran towards the nearest exit.

As Nightstrike and Darkfate move in the direction indicated by the
co-ordinates, they can clearly see their destination, or at least the
area around it. It is located at the top of a tall mountain, near
center of this island. Clouds wreath the top of it in a perpetual fog,
limiting conventional visiblity to a few meters. Fortunatly for the
Minions here, they are not limited to just conventional sight. 

"Acknowledged." Deepstryke replied over the radio, "Report to me once
you have landed."

A small beacon began to transmit a very short ranged homing signal.
(IE: The duo could pick it up, but it would not even reach off of the
island)

Preston
(Da'minion)
